content.heading: HTML Input Types
paragraphs: This chapter describes the different types for the HTML <input> element.

content.heading: Available Input Types
paragraphs: Here are the different input types you can use in HTML:
<input type="button">
<input type="checkbox">
<input type="color">
<input type="date">
<input type="datetime-local">
<input type="email">
<input type="file">
<input type="hidden">
<input type="image">
<input type="month">
<input type="number">
<input type="password">
<input type="radio">
<input type="range">
<input type="reset">
<input type="search">
<input type="submit">
<input type="tel">
<input type="text">
<input type="time">
<input type="url">
<input type="week">
Tip: The default value of the type attribute is "text."

content.heading: Input Type Text
paragraphs: <input type="text"> defines a single-line text input field.

content.heading: Example
Input Type Password
paragraphs: <input type="password"> defines a password field.

content.heading: Example
Input Type Submit
paragraphs: <input type="submit"> defines a button for submitting form data.

content.heading: Example
Input Type Reset
paragraphs: <input type="reset"> defines a reset button that will reset all form values to their default values.

content.heading: Example
Input Type Radio
paragraphs: <input type="radio"> defines a radio button, allowing only one selection from a set.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs: Choose your favorite Web language:

content.heading: Input Type Checkbox
paragraphs: <input type="checkbox"> defines a checkbox, allowing the user to select multiple options.

content.heading: Example
Input Type Color
paragraphs: <input type="color"> is used for input fields that should contain a color.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="favcolor">Select your favorite color:</label>
    <input type="color" id="favcolor" name="favcolor">
</form>

content.heading: Input Type Date
paragraphs: <input type="date"> specifies an input field for a date.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="birthday">Birthday:</label>
    <input type="date" id="birthday" name="birthday">
</form>

content.heading: Input Type Email
paragraphs: <input type="email"> is used for input fields that should contain an email address.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="email">Enter your email:</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" name="email">
</form>

content.heading: Input Type File
paragraphs: <input type="file"> defines a file-select field for file uploads.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="myfile">Select a file:</label>
    <input type="file" id="myfile" name="myfile">
</form>

content.heading: Input Type Hidden
paragraphs: <input type="hidden"> defines a hidden input field.

content.heading: Example
Input Type Number
paragraphs: <input type="number"> defines a numeric input field.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="quantity">Quantity (between 1 and 5):</label>
    <input type="number" id="quantity" name="quantity" min="1" max="5">
</form>

content.heading: Input Type Range
paragraphs: <input type="range"> defines a control for entering a number (like a slider).

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="vol">Volume (between 0 and 50):</label>
    <input type="range" id="vol" name="vol" min="0" max="50">
</form>

content.heading: Input Type Search
paragraphs: <input type="search"> is used for search fields.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="gsearch">Search Google:</label>
    <input type="search" id="gsearch" name="gsearch">
</form>

content.heading: Input Type Tel
paragraphs: <input type="tel"> is used for input fields that should contain a telephone number.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="phone">Enter your phone number:</label>
    <input type="tel" id="phone" name="phone" pattern="[0-9]{3}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{3}">
</form>

content.heading: Input Type Time
paragraphs: <input type="time"> allows the user to select a time.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="appt">Select a time:</label>
    <input type="time" id="appt" name="appt">
</form>

content.heading: Input Type Url
paragraphs: <input type="url"> is used for input fields that should contain a URL address.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="homepage">Add your homepage:</label>
    <input type="url" id="homepage" name="homepage">
</form>

content.heading: Input Type Week
paragraphs: <input type="week"> allows the user to select a week and year.

content.heading: Example
paragraphs:
<form>
    <label for="week">Select a week:</label>
    <input type="week" id="week" name="week">
</form>
